title: Jayson Galleguillos Designer
description: Graphic designer with major in UI/UX (interfaces and interactions. With certifications in design and multilingual skills, I offer creative and accessible solutions. My focus is on innovative projects that integrate artificial intelligence, drawing inspiration from usability and sustainability. Organized, Agile Method, team-oriented, and receptive to feedback, my portfolio reflects excellence in graphic project management. Discover how I transform ideas into impactful visual experiences.
